name: STANDING ON MY HEAD
description:
Standing on my Head :: a twenty seven page eBook exploring issues of self-discovery, love, and soul searching. This non-linear story takes the reader into a psychedelic journey comprised of poetry, text art, images and six electronic music compositions. This multimedia series was conceived by renowned interdisciplinary artist Guy-Vincent.

eBook + six music tracks are available to purchase worldwide via digital download 

Preview @ http://bit.ly/SOMH-GV

Website: www.GuyVincent.net
